title: Border, 1765–75
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: needle lace with 6 sided reworked ground
dimensions:
H x W: 192 x 8.5 cm (6 ft. 3 9/16 in. x 3 3/8 in.)
Repeat H: 62.9 cm (24 3/4 in.)
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Border of Point d'Argentan with a design of floral sprays bordered by foliated scroll work. Fond bride bouclée. Modes: point mignon, réseau mouché, portes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, 1765–75.
1765–75. Medium: linen
